message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can't have all the fun, I'll give you a smaller share this time!
Not fair, I want a bigger share!
You're getting less, but it's still a good deal!
You're getting lowballed, but I'll give you a tiny bit!
That's an insult! I want a better deal!
You're getting a tiny share, but I'm willing to compromise!
You're getting desperate, but I'll give you a small mercy!
You're being ruthless, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm making a serious offer, take it or leave it!
You're getting a tiny crumb, but it's better than nothing!
You're being ridiculous, I'm not accepting a $1 share!
I'm making a last-ditch effort, take it or walk away!
You're getting almost nothing, but I'm giving you a tiny bit more than that!
You're being merciless, I'm not accepting a $500 share!
I'm making a final offer, meet me in the middle!
You're getting a single dollar, don't say I didn't warn you!
You've gone too far, I'd rather walk away with nothing!
